title: Railworks TS2014 TaD Basic Line Metronom
description:
The Metronom* serves one of the most important parts in passenger traffic on the Hamburg - Hannover route*: commuter connection between the northern german cities former served by Deutsche Bahn. This scenariopack offers you seven interesting scenarios according to the actual timetables of the Metronom.

TaD Metronom 1. MEr 81605
Drive the Metronom 81605 from Hamburg Hbf to LÃƒÂ¼neburg.  No problems are expected on this run down south.

TaD Metronom 2. MEr 82120
Drive the Metronom 82120  from Uelzen to Hamburg Hbf on a sunny summerÃ‚Â´s day.

TaD Metronom 3. MEr 82811
Take the first Metronom of the day from Uelzen to Hanover.

TaD Metronom 4. MEr 82812
Drive the early morning Metronom from Hannover to Uelzen.

TaD Metronom 5. MEr 82126
This train runs between Uelzen and Hamburg. You will drive it to Winsen (Luhe) where another driver takes over.

TaD Metronom 6. MEr 81633
A short Metronom service from Harburg to LÃƒÂ¼neburg on a sunny sunday afternoon.

TaD Metronom 7. Freight to Wilhelmsburg
Drive a container train hauled by 2x Br151 from Hannover to Wilhelmsburg.

ItÃ‚Â´s a quiet night and no problems are to be expected.
